subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Jon Lester has backed up his prediction in 2007 that he would be the future of the franchise, beating St. Louis on Monday night for the second time in this World Series.
snippet: Pitcher Jon Lester has backed up his prediction in 2007 that he would be the future of the franchise, beating St. Louis on Monday night for the second time in this World Series.
